description:
Labour force participation

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
As regards labour force participation, the population can be
subdivided into persons in employment and persons not in
employment.
Persons in employment are all people with residence in the
territory of the Federal Republic (resident concept) who,
either directly or indirectly, perform a gainful activity
(self-employed persons, family workers, persons in paid
employment) during the reference period, no matter how
important the gains from this activity are for their
livelihood and irrespective of their actual or contractual
working hours.
